map_url <- function(city) {
  url <- paste0("https://api.jcdecaux.com/vls/v1/stations?contract=",city,"&apiKey=f57c56ee5683249b1d4f1fb38009d48c83827c81")
  df_api <- fromJSON(url) 
  return(df_api)
}


map_latlong <- map_url("Luxembourg") %>%
